--- ## ğŸ“– Overview AndroBuster is an **open-source security tool** inspired by GoBuster, providing a modern, cross-platform interface for directory and subdomain enumeration. Built with Flutter, it offers a clean, intuitive user experience while maintaining the power and flexibility expected from professional security tools. ### ğŸ¯ What Makes AndroBuster Special? - ğŸš€ **Cross-Platform**: Works on Android, iOS, and Desktop - ğŸ”’ **Security-Focused**: Built specifically for penetration testers - ğŸ’» **Modern UI**: Beautiful Flutter-based interface - âš¡ **High Performance**: Efficient threading and memory management - ğŸ“± **Mobile-First**: Optimized for mobile security testing --- ## ğŸ–¼ï¸ Screenshots

--- ## ğŸ“– æ¦‚è¦ AndroBusterã¯ã€GoBusterã«è§¦ç™ºã•ã‚ŒãŸ**ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ³ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã®ã‚»ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«**ã§ã‚ã‚Šã€ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªãŠã‚ˆã³ã‚µãƒ–ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®åˆ—æŒ™ã®ãŸã‚ã®ãƒ¢ãƒ€ãƒ³ã§ã‚¯ãƒ­ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ãªã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ•ã‚§ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’æä¾›ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚Flutterã§æ§‹ç¯‰ã•ã‚Œã¦ãŠã‚Šã€ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ•ã‚§ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ§ãƒŠãƒ«ãªã‚»ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã«æœŸå¾…ã•ã‚Œã‚‹å¼·åŠ›ã•ã¨æŸ”è»Ÿæ€§ã‚’ç¶­æŒã—ãªãŒã‚‰ã€ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã§ç›´æ„Ÿçš„ãªãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ä½“é¨“ã‚’æä¾›ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ ### ğŸ¯ AndroBusterã®ç‰¹é•·ã¯ï¼Ÿ - ğŸš€ **ã‚¯ãƒ­ã‚¹ãƒ—ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ **ï¼šAndroidã€iOSã€ãƒ‡ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒƒãƒ—ã§å‹•ä½œ - ğŸ”’ **ã‚»ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£é‡è¦–**ï¼šãƒšãƒãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼å‘ã‘ã«è¨­è¨ˆ - ğŸ’» **ãƒ¢ãƒ€ãƒ³UI**ï¼šç¾ã—ã„Flutterãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ•ã‚§ãƒ¼ã‚¹ - âš¡ **é«˜æ€§èƒ½**ï¼šåŠ¹ç‡çš„ãªã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ãŠã‚ˆã³ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªç®¡ç† - ğŸ“± **ãƒ¢ãƒã‚¤ãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ¼ã‚¹ãƒˆ**ï¼šãƒ¢ãƒã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚»ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã«æœ€é©åŒ– --- ## ğŸ–¼ï¸ ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒƒãƒˆ

RowTranslations.originContent: *A powerful directory and subdomain enumeration tool built with Flutter*

AndroBuster is an **open-source security tool** inspired by GoBuster, providing a modern, cross-platform interface for directory and subdomain enumeration. Built with Flutter, it offers a clean, intuitive user experience while maintaining the power and flexibility expected from professional security tools.
- ğŸš€ **Cross-Platform**: Works on Android, iOS, and Desktop
- ğŸ”’ **Security-Focused**: Built specifically for penetration testers
- âš¡ **High Performance**: Efficient threading and memory management
- ğŸ“± **Mobile-First**: Optimized for mobile security testing

Content: --- ## âœ¨ Features ### ğŸ—‚ï¸ Directory Enumeration Mode - **Target URL Input**: Clean URL handling with automatic trailing slash removal - **Negative Status Codes**: Filter out unwanted HTTP status codes (default: 404) - **Negative Page Sizes**: Exclude responses based on content length - **Wordlist Support**: Large text input with file import capability - **Threading Control**: Configurable thread count for optimal performance - **Timeout Settings**: Customizable request timeout in milliseconds ### ğŸŒ Subdomain Enumeration Mode - **Domain Input**: Clean domain handling (no http/https required) - **Subdomain Wordlists**: Dedicated wordlist management for subdomain discovery - **Protocol Testing**: Automatic HTTPS/HTTP fallback testing - **Subdomain Validation**: RFC 1123 compliant subdomain name validation - **Dedicated Filters**: Separate negative status codes and page sizes for subdomains - **Threading & Timeout**: Independent configuration from directory mode ### ğŸ“‹ Results Management - **Unified Results Tab**: View both directory and subdomain scan results - **Result Formatting**: Clear display of path, status code, size, and URL - **Copy to Clipboard**: Export results for external analysis - **Clear Results**: Easy cleanup between scans - **Result Counts**: Separate tracking for directory and subdomain results ### ğŸ“ File Management - **Wordlist Import**: Support for .txt files up to 50MB - **Smart Preview**: File size-aware content display - **Large File Handling**: Efficient processing of massive wordlists - **Format Support**: Handles comments (#) and empty lines automatically ### ğŸš€ Performance & Reliability - **Background Execution**: App continues running during background scans
Translation: --- ## âœ¨ æ©Ÿèƒ½ ### ğŸ—‚ï¸ ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªåˆ—æŒ™ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ - **å¯¾è±¡URLå…¥åŠ›**ï¼šè‡ªå‹•ã§æœ«å°¾ã®ã‚¹ãƒ©ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ã‚’é™¤å»ã™ã‚‹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ãªURLå‡¦ç† - **ãƒã‚¬ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ–ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰**ï¼šä¸è¦ãªHTTPã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°ï¼ˆãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆï¼š404ï¼‰ - **ãƒã‚¬ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ–ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚µã‚¤ã‚º**ï¼šã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„é•·ã«åŸºã¥ããƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ã®é™¤å¤– - **ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆå¯¾å¿œ**ï¼šå¤§å®¹é‡ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆå…¥åŠ›ãŠã‚ˆã³ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆæ©Ÿèƒ½ - **ã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰åˆ¶å¾¡**ï¼šæœ€é©ãªãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ã®ãŸã‚ã®ã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰æ•°è¨­å®šå¯èƒ½ - **ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆè¨­å®š**ï¼šãƒŸãƒªç§’å˜ä½ã§ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºå¯èƒ½ãªãƒªã‚¯ã‚¨ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ ### ğŸŒ ã‚µãƒ–ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³åˆ—æŒ™ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ - **ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³å…¥åŠ›**ï¼šhttp/httpsä¸è¦ã®ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ãªãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³å‡¦ç† - **å°‚ç”¨ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒ¼**ï¼šã‚µãƒ–ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ç”¨ã®åˆ¥å€‹ã®ãƒã‚¬ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒ–ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ»ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºè¨­å®š - **ã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ï¼†ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ**ï¼šãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¨ç‹¬ç«‹ã—ãŸè¨­å®šãŒå¯èƒ½ ### ğŸ“‹ çµæœç®¡ç† - **çµ±åˆçµæœã‚¿ãƒ–**ï¼šãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªãŠã‚ˆã³ã‚µãƒ–ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³çµæœã‚’ä¸€å…ƒè¡¨ç¤º - **çµæœãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒƒãƒˆ**ï¼šãƒ‘ã‚¹ã€ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã€ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºã€URLã‚’æ˜ç¢ºã«è¡¨ç¤º - **ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒãƒ—ãƒœãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¸ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼**ï¼šå¤–éƒ¨è§£æç”¨ã«çµæœã‚’ã‚¨ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆ - **çµæœã‚¯ãƒªã‚¢**ï¼šã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³é–“ã®ç°¡å˜ãªçµæœãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ - **çµæœæ•°ç®¡ç†**ï¼šãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã¨ã‚µãƒ–ãƒ‰ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³åˆ¥ã«çµæœæ•°ã‚’è¿½è·¡ ### ğŸ“ ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ç®¡ç† - **ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆ**ï¼šæœ€å¤§50MBã®.txtãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«å¯¾å¿œ - **ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼**ï¼šãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºã«å¿œã˜ãŸå†…å®¹è¡¨ç¤º - **å¤§å®¹é‡ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«å‡¦ç†**ï¼šå·¨å¤§ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã®åŠ¹ç‡çš„ãªå‡¦ç† - **ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒƒãƒˆå¯¾å¿œ**ï¼šã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆï¼ˆ#ï¼‰ã‚„ç©ºè¡Œã‚’è‡ªå‹•å‡¦ç† ### ğŸš€ ãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ï¼†ä¿¡é ¼æ€§ - **ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚°ãƒ©ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ‰å®Ÿè¡Œ**ï¼šã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ä¸­ã‚‚ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªãŒãƒãƒƒã‚¯ã‚°ãƒ©ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã§ç¶™ç¶šå‹•ä½œ

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Target URL Input**: Clean URL handling with automatic trailing slash removal
- **Negative Status Codes**: Filter out unwanted HTTP status codes (default: 404)
- **Negative Page Sizes**: Exclude responses based on content length
- **Wordlist Support**: Large text input with file import capability
- **Threading Control**: Configurable thread count for optimal performance
- **Timeout Settings**: Customizable request timeout in milliseconds
- **Domain Input**: Clean domain handling (no http/https required)
- **Subdomain Wordlists**: Dedicated wordlist management for subdomain discovery
- **Subdomain Validation**: RFC 1123 compliant subdomain name validation
- **Dedicated Filters**: Separate negative status codes and page sizes for subdomains
- **Threading & Timeout**: Independent configuration from directory mode
- **Unified Results Tab**: View both directory and subdomain scan results
- **Result Formatting**: Clear display of path, status code, size, and URL
- **Copy to Clipboard**: Export results for external analysis
- **Result Counts**: Separate tracking for directory and subdomain results
- **Wordlist Import**: Support for .txt files up to 50MB
- **Large File Handling**: Efficient processing of massive wordlists
- **Format Support**: Handles comments (#) and empty lines automatically
- **Background Execution**: App continues running during background scans

Content:
- **Memory Optimization**: Efficient handling of large wordlists - **Error Handling**: Graceful fallback and recovery mechanisms - **Cross-Platform**: Built with Flutter for Android and iOS --- ## ğŸ“± Installation ### ğŸ“¦ Release Build Currently, only Android APK releases are available. Navigate to the "Dir" tab 2. Enter your target URL 3. Configure negative status codes and page sizes 4. Paste or import your wordlist 5. Set thread count and timeout 6. Start the scan and monitor progress ### ğŸŒ Subdomain Enumeration 1. Navigate to the "Subdomain" tab 2. Enter the target domain (without http/https) 3. Configure subdomain-specific filters 4. Import or paste subdomain wordlist 5. Adjust threading and timeout settings

Begin subdomain discovery ### ğŸ“‹ Results Management - View all results in the "Results" tab - Copy results to clipboard for external analysis - Clear results between different scans - Monitor scan progress and completion --- ## âš™ï¸ Configuration ### âš¡ Thread Count - **Recommended**: 10-20 threads for most scenarios - **High Thread Warning**: Alerts when exceeding 20 threads - **Considerations**: Higher threads may trigger rate limiting ### â±ï¸ Timeout Settings - **Default**: 5000ms (5 seconds) - **Adjustment**: Increase for slower networks, decrease for faster responses - **Range**: 1000ms to 30000ms supported ### ğŸš« Negative Filters - **Status Codes**: Comma-separated list (e.g., 404,403,500) - **Page Sizes**: Comma-separated list (e.g., 0,1234,5678) - **Purpose**: Exclude unwanted responses from results --- ## ğŸ¤ Contributing This project is **open source** and welcomes contributions! The source code is now public and available for everyone.
[![Star Repository](https://img.shields.io/badge/â­%20Star%20Repository-yellow?style=for-the-badge&logo=github)](https://github.com/BlackHatDevX/androbuster)

RowTranslations.originContent: - View all results in the "Results" tab
- Copy results to clipboard for external analysis
- **High Thread Warning**: Alerts when exceeding 20 threads
- **Considerations**: Higher threads may trigger rate limiting
- **Adjustment**: Increase for slower networks, decrease for faster responses
This project is **open source** and welcomes contributions! The source code is now public and available for everyone.
